home.name: Vladyslav Buldenko
home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.description: Based in Kyiv, Ukraine. Dedicated to creating exceptional web experiences. Passionate and committed to delivering high-quality results.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer with about a year of experience building web applications using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, Express.js, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Coming from a background in scientific research, I’ve developed analytical thinking and attention to detail, which I now apply to development. I’m passionate about creating intuitive, user-friendly applications and always looking to learn and improve. I’m excited to find an opportunity where I can grow, collaborate with experienced teams, and work on impactful projects.

app.title: Web Application Development
app.subtitle: Providing quality web applications to clients and companies.
details: Developing responsive and dynamic web applications.
Using modern JavaScript libraries and frameworks like React and Next.js.
Ensuring cross-browser compatibility and performance optimization.
Implementing best practices for security and scalability.
